item.title: Core Archive India Regular Software Update - 24.1.2
item.content:encoded:

This will result in major downtime for our systems. [Medium] - Pre-Production Maintenance Schedule Summary: Scheduled pre-production maintenance is planned for various regions on March 5, 2024. This may cause some disruption but is not expected to have a major impact on services.

item.title: Cloud Fax services EMEA System Maintenance scheduled for 16 March 2024
item.content:encoded:
[Medium] - System Maintenance Scheduled

Summary: On 16 March 2024 from 11:00 UTC to 20:00 UTC, system maintenance will impact Fax2Mail, Production Messaging, and RightFax Connect. Intermittent service interruptions are expected. Disaster/Recovery customers will be rerouted for uninterrupted service, with a brief interruption possible during failover. Tracking number: C2021619.

THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 16, 11:00 - 20:00 UTC

Feb 15, 21:00 UTC
Scheduled - On 16 March 2024 from 11:00 UTC to 20:00 UTC a system maintenance has been scheduled that will affect these services:
- Fax2Mail
- Production Messaging
- RightFax Connect

Intermittent service interruptions are expected to occur throughout this timeframe.

Disaster/Recovery customers capable of being failed over to our alternate site will be rerouted for uninterrupted service. However, there may be a brief interruption when the failover occurs.

Tracking number: C2021619

item.title: Core Capture North America & Europe Export functionality failure
item.content:encoded:
Feb 9, 16:06 UTC
Resolved - This issue is considered resolved. If you have any questions, please reach out to us using the established communication channels.

Feb 9, 01:52 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are currently monitoring the situation.

This issue started at:
- 05:20 GMT on February 8, 2024 for North America
- 17:45 GMT on February 8, 2024 for Europe

This issue ended at:
- 01:30 GMT on February 9, 2024 for North America
- 01:30 GMT on February 9, 2024 for Europe

Feb 9, 00:09 UTC
Identified - We have been alerted of the possibility of export failures for customers that include an export filter. This depends on the DocType for the document, even if the Submit step reports that the export was successful. If you suspect your export may use such a filter, or if you do not know, please verify that documents were actually exported into your repository. We're working to address the issue as soon as possible.

This issue started at:
- 05:20 GMT on February 8, 2024 for North America
- 17:45 GMT on February 8, 2024 for Europe
